Articles.Content:
Cosmos, Sagan's famous science program, will be back shortly!!! And it will be hosted by Neil DeGrasse Tyson, so it's bound to be entertaining.

Turns out Seth Macfarlane (create of Family Guy) somehow convinced Fox of all companies to air that new science show. Macfarlane seems to be a science "nerd" too judging from his interviews with NDT: LINK

Anyway, here's the (pretty cool) trailer:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kBTd9--9VMI

Looking forward to this. The original Cosmos was a bit before my time (I was 5).

I'm amazed this is going to be prime-time on Fox (and National Geographic Channel). I wonder if something like this can get people writing to their representatives to get Science / NASA more funding.
